title: RIH Appointments
text: You can book appointments online or by phone. Same-day options may be limited.

title: RIH Billing
text: RIH accepts multiple insurance plans. Call the billing office to verify coverage before your visit.

title: Crisis Support
text: If you are in immediate danger call 911 or 988. Campus Police: (410) 455-5555. RIH urgent line: 410-455-2542.

title: Immunizations & Requirements
text: Review required immunizations and how to submit records. Upload documentation through the portal before deadlines.

title: RIH Hours & Location
text: Open weekdays with adjusted semester and break hours. Check the hours page for the latest schedule and the clinic location on campus.
